channel.title: Projectgeoffrey been banned from serverstatus why?
channel.description:
ProjectGeoffrey - THIS HAS MEMBERSHIP
THE REASON I WAS BANNED..
[b]Project Geoffrey!! What can i say bout this server?
"well if you get 20m and 105 combat level. (in the server) you can buy member."
I MEANT IN MY SERVER, IF YOU GET 20M AND 105 COMBAT YOU CAN BUY MEMBERSHIP WITH "MOPAR MONEY" NOT RUNESCAPE.
WHO EVER PLAYED THIS SERVER POST SAY I DONT SELL IT FOR RS GOLD!!
How Can i make money?
If You go straight down the stars past the guards you will see a Frog Princess go into her portal to kill torags and barbarians to get Red phats and other items! sell the red phats at the shop for 5m! Owner: Geoffrey
Administrators: admin rob i bl1tz u i Lumbby
Moderators: Holy Nite Kids Ranqe you can also make money by thieving smithing etc..
Some Things in the server:
-Dark Bow -Pretty Good Specs -Full Combat Skills -Full Pking -Wc for low cash -Rcing for runes -Fishing -Cooking -Thieving -Training spot such as Guards.
Member: Once your a member you can go to the Member spot -Barrows -Dharoks -Veracs -Ahrims -Karils -Training objects: -Pull lever for strength -open chest for attack -Hay stack for defence -range target -prayer altar
Rules:
Please obey the rules: No nocliping (of course) No massing if you do you'll get kicked or maybe even a bad punishment No doing the Trading Bug No pking at capes No 1 Iteming No Begging No bugging staff Well you know how it goes. Be friendly to the staff because we are always to you And keep the language down
Note: If you mass you wreck the server so don't do that please. For Starters there is ::cash command gives 50k you can do this as much as you like.
Enough Reading come join and play its FUN!!! No Lag!!!![/b][br][br][size=1]Posted on: December 27, 2007, 11:45:45 PM[/size][hr]bump:P[br][br][size=1]Posted on: December 28, 2007, 04:18:08 AM[/size][hr]..

item.title: Projectgeoffrey been banned from serverstatus why?
item.dc:creator: @Geoffrey11 Geoffrey11
item.description:
@Geoffrey11 wrote:

ProjectGeoffrey - THIS HAS MEMBERSHIP

THE REASON I WAS BANNED…

[b]Project Geoffrey!!
What can i say bout this server?

“well if you get 20m and 105 combat level.
(in the server)
you can buy member.”

I MEANT IN MY SERVER, IF YOU GET 20M AND 105 COMBAT YOU CAN BUY MEMBERSHIP WITH “MOPAR MONEY”
NOT RUNESCAPE.

WHO EVER PLAYED THIS SERVER POST SAY I DONT SELL IT FOR RS GOLD!!

How Can i make money?

If You go straight down the stars past the guards you will see a Frog Princess go into her portal to kill torags and barbarians to get Red phats and other items! sell the red phats at the shop for 5m!
Owner: Geoffrey

Administrators:
admin rob
i bl1tz u i
Lumbby

Moderators:
Holy Nite
Kids Ranqe
you can also make money by thieving smithing etc…

Some Things in the server:

-Dark Bow
-Pretty Good Specs
-Full Combat Skills
-Full Pking
-Wc for low cash
-Rcing for runes
-Fishing
-Cooking
-Thieving
-Training spot such as Guards.

Member:
Once your a member you can go to the Member spot
-Barrows
-Dharoks
-Veracs
-Ahrims
-Karils
-Training objects:
-Pull lever for strength
-open chest for attack
-Hay stack for defence
-range target
-prayer altar

Rules:

Please obey the rules:
No nocliping (of course)
No massing if you do you’ll get kicked
or maybe even a bad punishment
No doing the Trading Bug
No pking at capes
No 1 Iteming
No Begging
No bugging staff
Well you know how it goes.
Be friendly to the staff because we are always to you
And keep the language down

Note: If you mass you wreck the server so don’t do that please.
For Starters there is ::cash command gives 50k you can do this as much as you like.

Enough Reading come join and play its FUN!!! No Lag!!![/b][br][br][size=1]Posted on: December 27, 2007, 11:45:45 PM[/size][hr]bump:P[br][br][size=1]Posted on: December 28, 2007, 04:18:08 AM[/size][hr]…
